other_tests.findings: Features suggestive of erythema nodosum with some lobular granulomatous inflammation and thickened vessel walls.
Resulted in more than 20 mm of induration, indicating possible exposure to tuberculosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The size of the induration correlates with the specificity of the test for Mycobacterium tuberculosis, but does not indicate whether she has active or latent disease.
Follow-up CT scan after treatment for latent tuberculosis was within normal limits.
